<div width="80%;">
<h3>Details</h3>
<p align="justify">
This dataset provides global maps with per-pixel percentages of different vegetation types on an yearly basis. A water mask was applied with all pure water pixels (defined as ??? 95% water coverage) set to zero.
</p>

<h3>Subdatsets</h3>
| name                              | description                 |
|---------------------------------- |-----------------------------|
|`TreeCover`|Percent of tree cover|
|`NonTreeVegetation`|Percent of short vegetation|
|`NonVegetated`|Percent of non-vegetated surfaces|
</div>
